problem: 如图,一把带有60°角的三角尺放在两条平行线间,已知量得平行线间的距离为12cm,三角尺最短边和平行线成45°角,则三角尺斜边的长度为()
comment: 本题主要考查了平行线的性质,解决问题的关键是作辅助线构造等腰直角三角形．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, a triangle ruler with an angle of N_0 is placed between two parallel lines, and the distance between the parallel lines is known to be N_1. The shortest edge of the triangle ruler and the parallel line form an angle of N_2, then the length of the hypotenuse of the triangle ruler for()
